introParagraph: Chateau Haut-Brion is the only First Growth located in the Graves region (Pessac-Leognan). We purchase the Grand Vin Rouge, the incredibly rare Haut-Brion Blanc, and the second wines. Whether you have the legendary 1989 or recent vintages, selling directly to us is simple and secure.

faqs.question: Is Haut-Brion Blanc valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is one of the most expensive and rarest white wines in Bordeaux. We pay premium prices for it.

faqs.question: What is Bahans Haut-Brion?
faqs.answer: It was the second wine of the estate until 2007, when it was renamed Le Clarence de Haut-Brion. We buy both.

faqs.question: Why is the bottle shape different?
faqs.answer: Haut-Brion uses a proprietary squat bottle shape. This is traditional for the estate.

faqs.question: Which red vintage is best?
faqs.answer: 1989 is widely considered the greatest Haut-Brion ever made. Other top years include 1961, 2000, 2005, 2009, 2010.

faqs.question: Do you buy La Mission Haut-Brion?
faqs.answer: Yes, we also buy wines from the sister estate, Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion.

faqs.question: How do I ship the wider bottles?
faqs.answer: Standard styrofoam shippers usually fit, but sometimes a larger diameter insert is needed. Our shipping kits accommodate these bottles.
